title: Screening: New Media Art from China
hero_caption: <p>Zhang Peili. Still from <em>30 x 30</em>, 1988. Collection of the artist, Hangzhou.</p>
description:
On the occasion of his exhibition Zhang Peili: Record. Repeat., artist Zhang Peili presents a program of new media works by young artists currently working in China. These artists work in dynamic and experimental ways to develop a unique point of view that adeptly combines new technologies with the longer history of art production in China.

*Museum admission is free for Illinois residents every Thursday, 5:00–8:00—including during this event.

Li Binyuan, Divergent Paths, 2012, 3:30 min

Lin Ke, Lightening, 2014

Li Ran, Before Indulgence, After Freedom, 2013, 15:50 min

Zhang Liaoyuan, Say Something, 2007, 5:00 min

Lu Yang, Cancer Baby, 2014, 2:20 min

aaajiao, Meta3, 2013, 3:23

Sun Xun, Some Actions Which Haven't Been Defined Yet in the Revolution, 2011, 12:12 min

Chen Xiaoyun, Dirty Pants, 2013, 3:36 min

Wu Junyong, Dysphoria, 2010
